name: puppeteer_selectors_interaction
description: Element selection, clicking, typing, and page interaction

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const heading = await page.$('h1'); const text = await page.evaluate(el => el.textContent, heading); console.log('Found:', text); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Found: Example Domain

Element selected and text extracted

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://google.com'); await page.type('input[name="q"]', 'Puppeteer automation'); await page.keyboard.press('Enter'); await page.waitForNavigation(); console.log('Search submitted'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Search submitted

Typing and form submission completed

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const links = await page.$$('a'); console.log(`Found ${links.length} links`); for (let link of links) { const href = await page.evaluate(el => el.href, link); console.log('  Link:', href); } await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Found 1 links
  Link: https://www.iana.org/domains/example

Multiple elements found and iterated
